Christian Peck 60 Samba


Reckon we are in with a chance to beat Niels' total?
Highly unlikely, never the less we are going to have a cracking weekend!

I think it's always good to have the British record in mind (any one know what that is?).
As barndoors were never really imported into this country in the same great numbers as other countries, i have always thought that our get togethers probably represent the greatest gathering of barndoors in one place in Britain EVER!
Think we're gonna try and pop in for the day Saturday on route to our hotel for Goodwood. We'll be in the bug though not the BD
